mapper.select: SELECT reviewId FROM review WHERE productId=#{productId} and userId=#{userId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (userId, productId, reviewLikes, reviewTitle, goodReviews, badReviews, receiptImg, reviewImg) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{reviewLikes}, #{reviewTitle}, #{goodReviews}, #{badReviews}, #{receiptImg}, #{reviewImg});
mapper.select: SELECT user.userName, user.userImg, review.reviewDate, review.reviewTitle, review.goodReviews, review.badReviews, review.reviewImg, review.reviewLikes FROM user INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM review WHERE productId=#{productId}) review ON user.userId = review.userId WHERE review.receiptImg = #{receiptImg} order by review.reviewDate desc;
